text: Nick Conrad Busick (June 1, 1954 â€“ May 8, 2018) was an American professional wrestler and police officer. He was better known by his ring name Big Bully Busick. He was best known for his appearances with the World Wrestling Federation (WWF) in 1991, where he played a bully from the 1920s with a "turtleneck, bowler hat and king-sized cigar". Busick was also known for his appearances with Georgia All-Star Wrestling (GAF) and the Global Wrestling Federation (GWF). In November 2012, the WWE listed Busick as having the best mustache in the Top 10 mustaches in WWE history. Busick died of spinal cancer on May 8, 2018, in Weirton, West Virginia, where he was receiving hospice care at the age of 63. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1954 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Cancer deaths in West Virginia Category:Deaths from spinal cancer Category:Former WWE wrestlers Category:People from Steubenville, Ohio Category:Sportspeople from Ohio
title: Big Bully Busick
